>
[Remorseless Lash](/Feats.aspx?ID=1028) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Hobgoblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=268" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 50 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You’re skilled at beating a foe when their morale is already breaking. When you succeed at a melee weapon Strike against a [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) foe, that foe can’t reduce their frightened condition below 1 until the beginning of your next turn.
